SENT.plain: The cutaneous response to intradermal injection of monosodium urate crystals was investigated in 97 patients with BehÃ§et's syndrome in Turkey and 14 in the United Kingdom, and in 82 healthy and 88 diseased controls
Urate crystals produced an increased erythematous response in patients compared with controls in both countries
This response was different from that of the pathergy test performed at the same time
The systemic acute phase response, studied only in Turkey, showed no differences between patients and controls
